member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_ACCELERATION_STRUCTURE_POSTBUILD_INFO_DESC
member.summary: Description of the post-build information to generate from an acceleration structure. Use this structure in calls to and .

summary.para: Storage for the post-build info result. Size required and the layout of the contents written by the system depend on the value of the InfoType field.

The memory pointed to must be in state . The memory must be aligned to the natural alignment for the members of the particular output structure being generated (e.g. 8 bytes for a struct with the largest members being UINT64).

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_ACCELERATION_STRUCTURE_POSTBUILD_INFO_DESC.InfoType
member.summary: A value specifying the type of post-build information to retrieve.
